question:
An English speaking friend wants to spend a two-weeks holiday in your region and has written asking for information and advice
Write a letter to your friend. In your letter 
offer to find somewhere to stay
give advice about what to do
give information about  what clothes to bring
text: I am delighted that you are coming to Singapore next month. I think it would be great if you can stay with me and my family, who send you their best wishes. Otherwise, if you prefer, I can reserve you a cheap but comfortable hotel near the beach so that you can be more independent.

There are lots of things to do in my country. If I were you, I would spend some days on the beach relaxing and one or two days sightseeing in the city. There are several interesting museums and temples that I am sure you will enjoy.  Also, you ought to go to our excellent night safari which is about an hour away by bus.
You do not need to bring a lot of clothes because the weather is normally warm and sunny. However, in the evening it is a bit cooler, so you may need a jersey and jacket
Please let me know exactly when you are coming so that I can meet you at the airport. It will be great to see you again. So we can get up-to-date with all our news
